channel.title: Zombie Pants Texture (request)
channel.description: Is there anyone who can make a reskin of the zombies pants texture, to match the scientists. I think there was a fix for it with the free version of the mod but not the retail version. I do it if I knew how.

item.title: Zombie Pants Texture (request)
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Try using the free version mod, chances are the texture UVs haven’t changed and it’s compatible.

Read full topic
